scripts.test: echo "image-process-lib layer wraps 3rd party packages, jimp and exiftool, skipping unit test."

scripts.exiftool:install: mv exiftool-12.30/exiftool exiftool-12.30/lib t/exiftool && rm -rf exiftool-12.30/ exiftool.tar.gz
